participant_1.name: Alex Johnson
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and sociable, Alex is a natural leader but often struggles with focusing on his studies.
participant_1.background: I wish I could be more serious about school. I get distracted easily. I have been in a lot of romantic relationships that have ended up poorly. I am very athletic. I have lots of friends and can hold a conversation easily.

participant_2.name: Taylor Smith
participant_2.personality: Creative and free-spirited, Taylor loves expressing herself through her music and stands out with her unique style.
participant_2.background: I changed my hair color to blue. I like the color blue. I drive a blue car. I like to listen to Elvis.

content.text: Hi, I'm participant_1. I'm a 23-year-old graduate student at Stanford University. I'm studying computer science. I'm also a professional athlete. I play basketball for the Stanford Cardinal.
Hi, I'm participant_2. I'm a 22-year-old graduate student at Stanford University. I'm studying computer science. I'm also a musician. I play guitar and sing in a band.
That's cool. What kind of music do you play?
We play a mix of rock and blues.
Nice. I like rock and blues.
I like a lot of different bands, but my favorite is probably the Rolling Stones.
Oh, cool. I like the Rolling Stones too.
What's your favorite song by them?
That's a great song. I also like "Brown Sugar" and "Sympathy for the Devil."
Those are both great songs too.
I'm glad we have similar music tastes.
Well, it was nice talking to you.
